text: The Most Illustrious Order of Paduka Laila Jasa Keberanian Gemilang (), also translated as The Most Illustrious Order of Splendid Valour, is an order of Brunei. It was established on 1 August 1968 by Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah. The order consists of three classes: {| class="wikitable" !Class !Post-nominal !Title |- |First Class |DPKG |Dato Paduka Seri |- |Second Class |DLKG |Dato Laila |- |Third Class |DKG | - |} == References == Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Brunei Category:Awards established in 1968 Category:1968 establishments in Brunei
title: Order of Paduka Laila Jasa Keberanian Gemilang
